channel.title: amaaov.github.io
channel.description: amaaov public page: explore my values and commitments, work-time topics, and after-work interests. Join me in problem-solving, engineering, and creative performances.

item.title: Stay X Fresh lyrics
item.description: Stay X Fresh lyrics collection: punk and hardcore songs written by Sasha in 2008-2010, performed with Artem. Raw, aggressive lyrics about society, freedom, and resistance.

item.title: 2024 okaupunki lyrics
item.description: 2024 okaupunki lyrics collection: original ideas processed through GPT and Suno sound generator. Explore juggling-inspired poetry, multilingual verses, and experimental music concepts.

item.title: Suno Multitrack Player
item.description: Multi-track audio player for Suno-generated music with individual track controls and waveform visualization. Features Russian songs with separate vocal, drum, bass, and synth tracks.
